jalds.alds.ds.graphs
Class Graph

java.lang.Object
  jalds.alds.ds.graphs.Graph

public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object

A simple class to represent a graph, has useful methods to add an edge and vertex.

Author:
Devender Gollapally

Nested Class Summary
static class Graph.Type
          Represents the type of Graph either a directed or un-directed
 
Constructor Summary
Graph(Graph.Type type)
          Creates a new graph which can be either directed or un-directed
 
Method Summary
 void addEdge(Vertex a, Vertex b)
          Adds an edge from a into b, if it is an UN directed graph will also add the edge from b into a, if the vertex was not previously added using the addVertex method, this will add it In an un directed graph self loops are forbidden, so will not add any edges to the graph
NOTE: At present does not check for duplicates.
 void addVertex(Vertex vertex)
          Adds a new vertex to the graph
 boolean containsEdge(Vertex a, Vertex b)
           
 Vertex[][] getAdjacencyList()
          Returns the internal graph representation in the form of an adjacency list
 int[][] getAdjacencyMatrix()
          Returns the internal graph representation in the form of a adjacency matrix
 Vertex[] getAllAdjacentVertices(Vertex vertex)
          If the given vertex is in the graph will return all the adjacent vertices of the given vertex
 Graph.Type getType()
          Returns the graph type of this graph
 java.util.Set<Vertex> getVertices()
          Returns a list of all vertices in this graph
 java.lang.String matrixToString()
          Useful to print out the graph as an adjacency matrix
 int numberOfEdges()
          Returns the total number of edges in this graph
 int numberOfVertices()
          Returns the total number of vertices in this graph
 java.lang.String toString()
          Prints the graph's adjacency list

addEdge

public void addEdge(Vertex a,
                    Vertex b)
Adds an edge from a into b, if it is an UN directed graph will also add the edge from b into a, if the vertex was not previously added using the addVertex method, this will add it In an un directed graph self loops are forbidden, so will not add any edges to the graph
NOTE: At present does not check for duplicates.

Parameters:
a -
b -
